execution_plan.description: For EU sales: compute each customer's most recent order timestamp and the delay in seconds between the customer's profile update (customers.updated_at) and that most recent order.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT
  'EU' AS region,
  c.id AS customer_id,
  c.updated_at AS profile_updated_at,
  o.last_order_at,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (o.last_order_at - c.updated_at)) AS delay_seconds
FROM customers c
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT customer_id, MAX(updated_at) AS last_order_at
  FROM orders
  GROUP BY customer_id
) o ON o.customer_id = c.id;

execution_plan.description: For US sales: compute each customer's most recent order timestamp and the delay in seconds between the customer's profile update (customers.updated_at) and that most recent order.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT
  'US' AS region,
  c.id AS customer_id,
  c.updated_at AS profile_updated_at,
  o.last_order_at,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (o.last_order_at - c.updated_at)) AS delay_seconds
FROM customers c
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT customer_id, MAX(updated_at) AS last_order_at
  FROM orders
  GROUP BY customer_id
) o ON o.customer_id = c.id;
